#define ll long long int
#define fsentak for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define fsentak1 for(int i=0;i<(n-1);i++)
#define s(t) scanf("%d",&t)

using namespace std;





int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin >>t;
    char ch;
    string name;
    
    
    
    while(t--)
    {
        vector<string> s;
        map<string,char> votes;
        cin >>n;
        
        while(n--)
        {
            cin >>name >>ch;
            if(find(s.begin(),s.end(),name)==s.end())
            {
                s.push_back(name);
                
            }
            votes[name]=ch;
            
            
        }
        int sum=0;
        
        
        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
        {
            if(votes[s[i]]=='+')
            {
                sum+=1;
                
            }
            else
                sum-=1;
            
        }
        cout <<sum <<endl;
        
        
    }
}
